messages.title: Save Our NHS
messages.content: We have 48 hours to save our NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, guarantee cancer tests and results within one week

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tories are a threat to our NHS.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Staying at home or voting for any other party will let the Tories win.

issues.health: Labour will: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, guarantee cancer tests and results within one week. The Tories are a threat to our NHS: Worst A&E crisis on record, extreme cuts which threaten the survival of our NHS, waiting lists at their highest levels for six years.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is shaped as a medical bag with a white cross, implying healthcare as a primary campaign issue.
